item.title: Baustellenmod Map v1.2 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 8, 2025

Baustellenmod Map v1.2 1.54 ETS2

Approximately 15 highway construction sites in Germany and Switzerland. These construction sites can be driven on, and freight can be loaded and loaded there.

Traffic obstructions are also included (breakdowns, accidents, etc.).
It may happen that one or two models are not visible when the map is first loaded, but this should become less noticeable over time.

Version 1.2
Map errors corrected (as far as known)

New construction sites:
Köhlbrand Bridge
A3 near Nuremberg (delivery and delivery via adjacent farm track)
Swiss A2 national highway from Basel to Chiasso in the Gotthard Tunnel
Austria A22 near Innsbruck heading south
Cologne city, construction site with detour via swing bridge
Duisburg construction site
Dortmund construction site
New company “Auf Achse Hoch und Tief”

New trailer arrangements for loading and unloading!

Credits: AcMcFat

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania S/R New Sunshield v1.1 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 8, 2025

Scania S/R New Sunshield v1.1 1.54 ETS2

High Polygone Model!!
– 100% Paintable
– Paindet or Custom Skin!
– With Orange LEDs or White LEDs
– With CB antenna or without
– Flares can be adjusted
-T emplate in 4096×4096 included!

Tested and adapted for 1.54.x

item.title: REAL AI COUNTRY SPAWNS ADD-ON for Jazzycat v21.8.6.A ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 8, 2025

REAL AI COUNTRY SPAWNS ADD-ON for Jazzycat v21.8.6.A ETS2

NEWS:
This internal update features several resized vehicles and brings three vehicles I removed in the past.
– Vehicles brought back and set to spawn in traffic: BMW 2 GranCoupe F44, Seat Ateca /removed second exhaust/, VW Arteon /resized/.
– Vehicles resized: Mercedes-Benz G-Class ’18 /it was too wide and big in overall/, Mercedes-Benz S-Class W223 /it was too small/, Mercedes-Benz Vito ’03 /it was too big in overall/, Skoda Kodiaq /it was too small/, Tesla Model S /from ATS, it was too small/, VW Arteon /it was too narrow/.
– Adjusted spawns for Kazakhstan.
– Minor changes and fixes.

This add-on sets all cars to REAL SPAWNS BY COUNTRY they appear in. Every country has custom setting of all cars spawning, according to the real traffic and car brands popularity. Spawns follow also country’s wealth, which means no more luxury cars on every corner in less wealthy countries like Romania or Macedonia for example. I studied those countries using sells statistics and dashcam videos from most countries, this is actually result of several years of work and contant improving. I had this for my private use, but I decided to share it publicly now.
Add-on also fixes spawning of cars in left-drive countries, like United Kingdom or Ireland, with wrong-positioned steering wheel and driver – by disallowing cars that don’t have model for these countries. There is an exception for vans with UK skins, which would be missing on UK roads otherwise.
Countries with spawns set are all SCS countries. Add-on also supports and set spawns for these map mods: Promods, Promods Middle-East, Promods Great Steppe, Road to Asia and Road To Africa (by Terramaps), Java Road Revolution map (= Indonesia map), Maghreb map mod (North part of Africa), Heart of Africa and Horn of Africa maps.
This add-on also includes lots of fixes and new features:
Wheel changes, real colours and generic colour palette, trailers variety, disable bad models of cars from traffic, texture fixes etc.
This version is only compatible with Jazzycat’s AI traffic pack v21.8.6 for ETS2 version 1.54.
You need to download Jazzycat’s AI traffic pack in order to work! Place my add-on ABOVE the Jazzycats’s AI pack in the mod manager!

Credits: Egon, Jazzycat, SCS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s FTE Trailer Skins Pack 5 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 8, 2025

The Godfather’s FTE Trailer Skins Pack 5 ATS

The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021 Brings to you the 5th Skins Pack for the FTE Reefer Trailer with 4 skins in the pack.
DO NOTE ONLY HAVE 1 OF MY FTE TRAILER SKINS PACKS TURNED ON (GREEN LIGHT) FOR THE SKINS IN THIS PACK TO WORK IN GAME THERE IS A DETAILED VIDEOON HOW TO MAKE THIS MOD PACK AND OTHER FTE SKIN PACKS OF MINE WORK 100% FOR ATS AT MY YOU TUBE CHANNEL AUSTRALIA WORLDWIDE ENTERTAINMENT NOW FOLKS SHOWN ON MY ATS PLAYLIST..
AS THIS PACK HAS BEEN SKINNED USING A OLD PACK FROM THE OLD MODDING FORMAT AS THERE IS NO XML FILE FOR ME TO DO A FULL ON SKIN PACK
DUE TO NO ONE ABLE TO GET ME A XML FILE FOR THE TRAILER MOD IF ANYONE HAS ONE KNOW PLEASE CONTACT ME ON MY YOU TUBE CHANNEL.

Skins that are in this pack listed below also what country the brand or company comes from..
– Doblo’s Fruit & Veg Rockhampton (Australia)
– Joe Booth Transport (Australia)
– SLR Trans (Australia)
– Tutti Frutti Wholesale Coffs Harbour (Australia)

Credits: The Godfather's Mods Company EST 2021 Australia Worldwide Entertainment You Tube channel EST 2018
